confattr.state module

confattr.state.has_any_config_file_been_instantiated = False

This is set when instantiating a ConfigFile. Trying to change a key when this flag is set will raise a TimingError.

confattr.state.has_config_file_been_instantiated = False

This is set when instantiating a ConfigFile without passing config_instances, i.e. one that should support all settings. Trying to create a Config when this flag is set will raise a TimingError.
